channel.title: pinpoint
channel.description: Intended as a documentation theme based on Jekyll for technical writers documenting software and other technical products, this theme has all the elements you would need to handle multiple products with both multi-level sidebar navigation, tags, and other documentation features.

item.title: Pinpoint starts to support PHP
item.description:
Great News to the PHP users. Pinpoint PHP-agent is open:)

Visit our Pinpoint-PHP-Agent repository(https://github.com/naver/pinpoint-c-agent) for more information.

Additionally, Pinpoint-NodeJS-Agent project is going to start soon.

item.title: Official docker for Pinpoint is On-line
item.description:
Having hard time installing pinpoint?
Pinpoint has started to support Docker.

Visit our Official Pinpoint-Docker repository(https://github.com/naver/pinpoint-docker) for more information.

item.title: 1.7.3 Release
item.description:
We’re happy to announce the release of Pinpoint v1.7.3. Please check the release note at https://github.com/naver/pinpoint/releases/tag/1.7.3.

The current stable version is v1.7.3.

item.title: 1.7.2 Release
item.description:
We’re happy to announce the release of Pinpoint v1.7.2. Please check the release note at https://github.com/naver/pinpoint/releases/tag/1.7.2.

The current stable version is v1.7.2.

item.title: Pinpoint Twitter is On-line
item.description: Now, Pinpoint Twitter is On-line. Follow us on Twitter

item.title: 1.7.1 Release
item.description:
We’re happy to announce the release of Pinpoint v1.7.1. Please check the release note at https://github.com/naver/pinpoint/releases/tag/1.7.1.

item.title: Plugin Development Guide is open
item.description: We now have a plugin development guide(https://github.com/naver/pinpoint/wiki/Pinpoint-Plugin-Developer-Guide “Pinpoint Plugin Development Guide”). Yay!
